attributes.action: Stop the unnecessary development of greenbelt land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our infrastructure cannot cope with all
the core strageties planned by local councils. Enough is enough, we need open spaces to breathe not dodge more traffic, breathe in more fumes, create more dark alleyways. come on give us our green and pleasant land back.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
